conversation.event: <0>speech</0> <1>My name is Alicia. Perhaps you've heard of me?</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Hello. I think I have heard you're name somewhere...</1> <2>player</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Yes. Some people do know who I am.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>I work in here on this machine. Soon it will be perfect.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>Have a nice day. Or is it night? I don't know.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>I removed all the windows in here. It's more secure this way.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
<0>speech</0> <1>In any case, have a nice stay.</1> <2>matoran</2> <3></3> <4></4>
